content: Yeah, I’m 56, childless and fine. Don’t even worry about it. My friends all have kids. I adore their kids. Best of all, I enjoy leaving their house and their kids, husbands, parents, friends and whoevs… and going back home to my own private world, sans children. It’s what’s right for me. Fuck ’em because if they don’t get it, they don’t get me. Case closed. And if they are so judgemental, how good of a friend are they really?
